en_title: Information on funding of ODR platform rectified
zh_title: 律政司更正網上爭議解決平台撥款資料

en: In regard to the information on funding of the online dispute resolution (ODR) platform presented in the Legislative Council (LegCo) Panel on Administration of Justice and Legal Services (AJLS Panel) today, the Department of Justice (DoJ) made the following rectification:

With the establishment of the COVID-19 ODR Scheme under the second round of the Anti-epidemic Fund, eBRAM International Online Dispute Resolution Centre Limited (eBRAM Centre) was allocated a funding support of $50 million for the COVID-19 ODR Scheme.

In January this year, with support from members of the LegCo AJLS Panel, the Finance Committee approved funding support of $100 million for the development, enhancement and initial operation of an online dispute resolution and deal making platform by eBRAM Centre.
The DoJ has already notified the Clerk to the LegCo AJLS Panel of the above rectification.
zh: 就今日（五月十四日）在立法會司法及法律事務委員會有關向網上爭議解決平台撥款的資料，律政司作出以下更正：
因應在第二輪「防疫抗疫基金」下設立「2019冠狀病毒病網上爭議解決計劃」，政府向一邦國際網上仲調中心（eBRAM中心）提供了5,000萬元撥款。
今年一月，在獲得立法會司法及法律事務委員會的支持下，立法會財務委員會通過向eBRAM中心提供一億元撥款，以支持其網上爭議解決及交易平台的發展、提升和初期運作。
律政司已就上述更正通知立法會司法及法律事務委員會秘書。
